page.title: 12HUNTING
page.content: A{fox hunt}is when people chase foxes on horse back and try to kill it by shooting at it. When a fox is found and killled it is fed to the hounds that have helped in the killing. People in the area of Shirwell have been intrested in fox hunting for many years and if you own a horse then you can take part and most people do. The hunt usually goes on in the Autumn about once a week.And there is a small charge of Â£1 per person which pays for the hounds food,the lorry to transport them and for the master of the hunt. Usually about 20 people come to the hunt and some people stay just to watch but they don't always stay to the finish of the hunt because little chilren can get bored and their parents get hungry.
